mapper.select: SELECT member.m_id AS m_id, review.r_content AS r_content, review.r_register_time AS r_register_time ,review.r_play_score AS r_play_score FROM play, schedule, review, member WHERE review.s_id = schedule.s_id AND schedule.p_id = '1' AND review.m_code = member.m_code LIMIT 20;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(m_code, s_id, r_content, r_play_score, r_actor1_score, r_actor2_score) VALUES (#{m_code}, #{s_id}, #{r_content}, #{r_play_score}, #{r_actor1_score}, #{r_actor2_score})
